data.event: Derek Keats born at James Payton Memorial Hospital, in Gander, Newfoundland, Canada.

event.title: Derek Keats attends Emmanuel United Church elementary school

data.event: Derek Keats attends Emmanuel United Church Elementary School, in Gambo, Newfoundland, Canada.
Derek Keats graduated from Smallwood Academy in Gambo, Newfoundland, Canada.
Derek Keats entered Memorial University of Newfoundland, in St John's, Newfoundland, Canada
